title: Features frenzy
subtitle: Dive into the magic that makes us stand out in the digital crowd

features.title: 5-hop novel mixnet
features.text: Splits and encrypts data into smaller packets, which is mixed, rebuilt and decrypted on the receiving side. Cover traffic, time delay, and encryption protects your data and your metadata

features.title: 2-hop secure WireGuard dVPN
features.text: Drop the cover traffic to go light-weight and speedy! The dVPN mode with two hops uses onion encryption and protects your IP address from local adversaries. Not even the VPN app itself will be able to link your communications.

features.title: Proven and robust cryptographic primitives
features.text: Access to the service without revealing  sensitive information, enhancing privacy and security

features.title: Zero-knowledge proof access
features.text: Access to the service without revealing  sensitive information, enhancing privacy and security

features.title: Key rotation / forward secrecy / replay protection
features.text: Access to the service without revealing  sensitive information, enhancing privacy and security

features.title: Killswitch and autoconnect
features.text: Automatic connection and security fail-safe for uninterrupted protection

features.title: Tor-level privacy and VPN speed in one app

features.title: Split tunnelling
features.text: Routing selected use case traffic between mixnet and WireGuard dVPN, for best privacy AND performance

features.title: Private payments
features.text: Payment method ensuring privacy and concealing user identity for transactions

features.title: Unlinkable pathways and no backdoors
features.text: Inability to correlate IPs with network requests by design; No covert access to traffic and private data

features.title: Decentralized and incentivized network
features.text: Failsafe, high-performing and independent network structure
